title: Attachment of salary, etc.
context: §653-2 Attachment of salary, etc. The salary, stipend, or wages of the beneficiary may be attached for, and applied in the payment of the beneficiary&rsquo;s debts, in the manner prescribed in this chapter. [L 1890, c 50, §2; am L 1921, c 66, §1; RL 1925, §2847; RL 1935, §4293; RL 1945, §10322; RL 1955, §238-2; HRS §653-2; gen ch 1985]
